1983 kalu juliya samanga pujaniya sthana, jana jiwitha ha depala winasha kirima mangin eltitiee ya prawesha wu biyakaru thrasthawadaya hadisi nithiya matha rata palanaya kirimata awasanawantha parisarayak godanaguwa. 1988-1989 kalaye dakune wyaptha wu thrasthawadi karali da ee kalaye sita kramayen uthsanna wu deshapalanagnyayin ghathanaya kirima thulin da hadisi nithiye awashyathawaya sadharanikaranaya kala. 2002 jathyantharaye sahabhagithwayen da athi kara gath sama giwisuma thula samayata prawesha wimata dora wiwrutha kirimak lesa iwath kala hadisi nithiya nawatha hisa esawuye ema sama giwisuma ma eltitiee ya wisin awastha gananawaka di ma nirantharayen ullanghanaya kirimath ehi uthsanna awasthawak lesa lashman kadiragamar widesha amathyawaraya ghathanaya kirimath nisayi. 2005 mage nayakathwayen me rate rajya palanaye wagakima bhara ganna wita apita uruma wuye mewani parisarayak.
